This is a brain dump of my attempts for Advent of Code ([adventofcode.com](https://adventofcode.com))

Click on any of the yellow stars to see my solution for that day.

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
source("_rhelp/aoc_table.R")
year_dirs <- list.files(pattern = "year_\\d{4}$")
create_aoc_star_table(file.path(year_dirs, "days.yml"))
```
